data.title: Longmont Symphony Orchestra
data.text:
2024-2025

Individual Tickets Now On Sale

Reserve your seats today!

Custom 3-Concert Ticket Packages now available!

Call the LSO office at 303-772-5796 to order.

Season Concerts & Events

Gershwin Piano Concerto

Saturday, October 5th

An Evening of Romance

Saturday, November 16th

The Gentle Nutcracker

Saturday, December 7th

The Nutcracker

Saturday, December 7th

Handel's Messiah

Saturday, December 14th

Peter and the Wolf

Saturday, January 18th

The Light After The Storm

Saturday, February 15th

Bach's B Minor Mass

Saturday, April 12th

Pops: A Western Hoedown

Saturday, May 3rd

"The sounds, bouncing off the walls of an acoustically precise concert hall, were almost more than could be absorbed… along with the brilliant interpretation of three concert favorites."

/

"Thank you for all you do for the orchestra and for Longmont! We are fortunate to have you here."

/

"As usual, I was unable to get to sleep after the concert. I was just too revved up by the performance!"

/

"The finale, Antonin Dvorak’s 8th Symphony, was a masterpiece performed masterfully."

/

Education & Community

We strive to enrich, inspire and serve our extended community with music, education, and community based programs.

Donations & Sponsorship

Help us continue to bring meaningful experiences and opportunities to Longmont.

Special Events

From intimate house concerts to seasonal celebrations—come enjoy the other exciting events LSO has to offer.

We envision a world where music is a catalyst that deepens awareness of our shared humanity.
